text: Luis Gámir Casares (8 May 1942 – 15 January 2017) was a Spanish politician. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Politicians from Madrid Category:Complutense University of Madrid alumni Category:Members of the constituent Congress of Deputies (Spain) Category:Members of the 1st Congress of Deputies (Spain) Category:Members of the 5th Congress of Deputies (Spain) Category:Members of the 6th Congress of Deputies (Spain) Category:Members of the 7th Congress of Deputies (Spain) Category:Members of the 8th Congress of Deputies (Spain) Category:People's Party (Spain) politicians Category:Union of the Democratic Centre (Spain) politicians Category:Spanish economists
title: Luis Gámir
